Enter desired lesson number and click on panda.
resources.array:
好。Hǎo. Good, okay.
不好。Bù hǎo. Not good, not okay.
好不好？Hǎo bù hǎo? Okay?
很好。Hén hǎo. Very good.
你好。Ní hǎo. Hello.
你好吗？Ní hǎo ma? Are you well?
你们好。Nǐmen hǎo. Hi, guys.
你们好吗？Nǐmen hǎo ma? Are you guys well?
我很好。Wǒ hén hǎo. I am very good.
我们很好，谢谢。Wǒmen hén hǎo, xièxiè. We are very good, thanks.
我们在哪儿？Wǒmen zài nǎ’er? Where are we?
我们在饭店。Wǒmen zài fàndiàn. We are at a restaurant.
你吃什么？Nǐ chī shénme? What are you eating?
我吃米饭，你呢？Wǒ chī mǐfàn, nǐ ne? I am eating rice, what about you?
我不想吃。Wǒ bù xiǎng chī. I do not want to eat.
你喝水吗？Nǐ hē shuǐ ma? Are you drinking water?
我不喜欢水。Wǒ bù xǐhuān shuǐ. I do not like water.
我喝茶。Wǒ hē chá. I am drinking tea.
这是什么菜？Zhè shì shénme cài? What dish is this?
这是水果，它很好吃！Zhè shì shuíguǒ, tā hén hǎo chī! This is fruit, it is very delicious!
我叫鲁迅。Wǒ jiào Lǔ Xùn. My name is Lu Xun.
你叫什么名字？Nǐ jiào shénme míngzì？ What is your name?
我喜欢你的名字。Wǒ xǐhuān nǐ de míngzì. I like your name.
你住在哪儿？Nǐ zhù zài nǎ’er？Where do you live?
我住在中国。Wǒ zhù zài Zhōngguó. I live in China.
我爱中国。Wǒ ài Zhōngguó. I love China.
我爸爸是中国人。Wǒ bàba shì Zhōngguó rén. My father is Chinese.
他妈妈是老师。Tā māma shì lǎoshī. His mother is a teacher.
她会说汉语。Tā huì shuō hànyǔ. She can speak Chinese.
中国人都会说汉语。Zhōngguó rén duō huì shuō hànyǔ. Chinese people can all speak Chinese.
你有几个苹果？Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè píngguǒ? How many apples do you have?
我有一个苹果。Wǒ yǒu yí gè píng guǒ. I have one apple.
他有三个儿子。他们很小。Tā yǒu sān gè érzi. Tāmen hén xiǎo. He has three sons. They are very little.
她有五个女儿。她们很大。Tā yǒu wǔ gè nǚ\'ér. Tāmen hěn dà. She has five daughters. They are very big.
他们有四个儿子和六个女儿。Tāmen yǒu sì gè érzi hé liù gè nǚ\'ér. They have four sons and six daughters.
你的电话是多少？Nǐ de diànhuà shì duōshǎo? What is your phone number?
我的电话是一二三四五六七八九零。Wǒ de diànhuà shì yī èr sān sì wǔ liù qī bā jiǔ líng. My phone number is 1234567890.
我能打电话吗？Wǒ néng dǎ diànhuà ma? May I make a phone call?
没关系。Méiguānxì. That is all right.-->
再见。Zàijiàn. Goodbye.-->
先生，您好吗？Xiānshēng, nín hǎo ma? Sir, are you well?
李先生没有电脑。Lǐ Xiānshēng méiyǒu diànnǎo. Mr. Li does not have a computer.
王小姐没有电视。Wáng Xiǎojiě méiyǒu diànshì. Miss Wang does not have a television.
你想不想看电影？Nǐ xiǎng bù xiǎng kàn diànyǐng? Do you want to see a movie?
对不起，我没有钱。Duìbùqǐ, wǒ méiyǒu qián. Sorry, I have no money.
没关系，我有很多钱。Méiguānxì, wó yǒu hěnduō qián. That is alright, I have a lot of money.
谢谢你！Xièxiè nǐ! Thank you!
不客气。Bú kèqì. You are welcome.
我们去看电影。Wǒmen qù kàn diànyǐng. We are going to see a movie.
明天见。Míngtiān jiàn. See you tomorrow.-->
今天我们去北京。Jīntiān wǒmen qù Běijīng. Today we are going to Beijing.
北京在哪儿？Běijīng zài nǎ\'er? Where is Beijing?
北京在中国。Běijīng zài Zhōngguó. Beijing is in China.
我们怎么去北京？Wǒmen zěnme qù Běijīng? How are we going to Beijing?
我们坐火车去。Wǒmen zuò huǒchē qù. We are going by train.
我们不坐飞机。Wǒmen bú zuò fēijī. We are not taking a plane.
现在我们去火车站。Xiànzài wǒmen qù huǒchēzhàn. Now we are going to the train station.
我们坐出租车。Wǒmen zuò chūzūchē. We are taking a taxi.
北京的天气很好。Běijīng de tiānqì hén hǎo. Beijing\'s weather is very good.
我很高兴！Wó hěn gāoxìng! I am very happy!
你喜欢你的学校吗？Nǐ xǐhuān nǐ de xuéxiào ma? Do you like your school?
喜欢！Xǐhuān! Yes, I like it!
老师都很好。Lǎoshī dōu hén hǎo. The teachers are all very good.
我最喜欢我的中文老师。Wǒ zuì xǐhuān wǒ de zhōngwén lǎoshī. I most like my Chinese teacher.
你会写中文吗？Nǐ huì xiě zhōngwén ma? Can you write Chinese?
我会写十个字。Wǒ huì xiě shí gè zì. I can write ten characters.
我有一本书。Wó yǒu yī běn shū. I have one book.
它在桌子上。Tā zài zhuōzi shàng. It is on the table.
你的汉语很好！Nǐ de hànyǔ hén hǎo! Your (spoken) Chinese is very good!
对不起。我听不懂。Duì bù qǐ. Wǒ tīng bù dǒng. I\'m sorry. I don\'t understand.
你的中文老师是谁？Nǐ de zhōngwén lǎoshī shì shéi? Who is your Chinese teacher?
他是陈老师。Tā shì Chén Lǎoshī. He is Teacher Chen.
我认识他。Wǒ rènshí tā. I know him.
他是我的朋友。Tā shì wǒ de péngyǒu. He is my friend.
你认识我的同学吗？Nǐ rènshí wǒ de tóngxué ma? Do you know my classmate?
他叫什么名字？Tā jiào shénme míngzì? What is his name?
他叫小赵。Tā jiào Xiǎo Zhào. His name is Young Zhao.
不认识。Bú rènshí. I don\'t know him.
学生做什么？Xuéshēng zuò shénme? What do students do?
学生学习。Xuéshēng xuéxí. Students study.
今天的天气怎么样？Jīntiān de tiānqì zěnmeyàng? How is the weather today?
今天很热。Jīntiān hěn rè. Today is very hot.
明天呢？Míngtiān ne? What about tomorrow?
明天很冷。Míngtiān hén lěng. Tomorrow is very cold.
今天上午下雨了。Jīntiān shàngwǔ xiàyǔ le. This morning it rained.
今天下午也下雨了。Jīntiān xiàwǔ yě xiàyǔ le. This afternoon it also rained.
今天晚上也会下雨。Jīntiān wǎnshàng yě huì xiàyǔ. This evening it will also rain.
昨天没有下雨。Zuótiān méiyǒu xiàyǔ. Yesterday it did not rain.
明天也不会下雨。Míngtiān yě bú huì xià yǔ. Tomorrow it will not rain either.
中午呢？Zhōngwǔ ne? What about at noon?
现在是七点钟吗？Xiànzài shì qī diǎn zhōng ma? It it 7:00 now?
不是七点钟。Bùshì qī diǎn zhōng. It is not 7:00.
现在是八点钟吗？Xiànzài shì bā diǎn zhōng ma?
不是八点钟。Búshì bā diǎn zhōng. It is not 8:00.
现在是几点钟？Xiànzài shì jí diǎn zhōng? What time is it now?
现在是上午九点钟。Xiànzài shì shàngwǔ jiú diǎn zhōng. Now it is 9:00 in the morning.
昨天是星期一。Zuótiān shì xīngqī yī.Yesterday was Monday.
今天是星期二。Jīntiān shì xīngqī èr. Today is Tuesday.
明天是星期三。Míngtiān shì xīngqī sān. Tomorrow is Wednesday.
星期四是什么时候呢？Xīngqī sì shì shénme shíhòu ne? When is Thursday?
我的狗在桌子下。Wǒ de gǒu zài zhuōzi xià. My dog is on the table.
我的猫在椅子上。Wǒ de māo zài yízi shàng. My cat is under the chair.
你的狗太大了。Nǐ de gǒu tài dà le. Your dog is too big.
你的猫太小了。Nǐ de māo tài xiǎole. Your cat is too small.
你有几个苹果？Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè píngguǒ? How many apples do you have?
我有两个。Wó yǒu liǎng gè. I have two.
太少了。Tài shǎo le. Too few.
我们要去商店。Wǒmen yào qù shāngdiàn. We are going to go to the store.
我们要买一些苹果。Wǒmen yāomǎi yīxiē píngguǒ. We will buy some apples.
我们也要买衣服。Wǒmen yě yào mǎi yīfu. We will also buy some clothes.
